Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewCore.status

Enum ViewSubTurn

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<ViewSubTurn>
it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewCore.status.ViewSubTurn
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientAddressable, Addressable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ViewSubTurn>, java.lang.constant.Constable
public enum ViewSubTurn
extends java.lang.Enum<ViewSubTurn>
implements ClientAddressable
Enumeration describing the status of the Game. It indicates the specific actions to perform in specific information needed to display and the action that can be performed in each moment. It specifies, for example, the turn status on which the game is.
Author:
giorgio

  • Enum Constant Details

    • SELECTWORKER

      public static final ViewSubTurn SELECTWORKER
      SubTurn relative to the Playing status. In this SubTurn the player have to choose a worker.

    • OPPONENT_SELECTWORKER

      public static final ViewSubTurn OPPONENT_SELECTWORKER
      SubTurn relative to the Playing status. In this SubTurn the adversary have to choose a worker. The player can do nothing.

    • BUILD

      public static final ViewSubTurn BUILD
      SubTurn relative to the Playing status. In this SubTurn the player can build.

    • OPPONENT_BUILD

      public static final ViewSubTurn OPPONENT_BUILD
      SubTurn relative to the Playing status. In this SubTurn the adversary can build. The player can do nothing.

    • MOVE

      public static final ViewSubTurn MOVE
      SubTurn relative to the Playing status. In this SubTurn the player can move.

    • OPPONENT_MOVE

      public static final ViewSubTurn OPPONENT_MOVE
      SubTurn relative to the Playing status. In this SubTurn the adversary can move. The player can do nothing.

    • SELECTCARD

      public static final ViewSubTurn SELECTCARD
      SubTurn relative to the GamePreparation status. In this SubTurn the player can move.

    • PLACEWORKER

      public static final ViewSubTurn PLACEWORKER
      SubTurn relative to the GamePreparation status. In this SubTurn the player can place a worker.

    • OPPONENT_PLACEWORKER

      public static final ViewSubTurn OPPONENT_PLACEWORKER
      SubTurn relative to the GamePreparation status. In this SubTurn the adversary can place a worker. The player can do nothing.

    • BUILD_BLOCK

      public static final ViewSubTurn BUILD_BLOCK
      SubTurn relative to the Playing status. In this SubTurn the player can build a block. This has not a correspective on the Server, it's seen as the Build is.

    • BUILD_DOME

      public static final ViewSubTurn BUILD_DOME
      SubTurn relative to the Playing status. In this SubTurn the player can build a dome. This has not a correspective on the Server, it's seen as the Build is.

    • CHOOSE_FIRST_PLAYER

      public static final ViewSubTurn CHOOSE_FIRST_PLAYER
      SubTurn relative to the GamePreparation status. In this SubTurn the challenger have to choose the starting player.

    • set

      public static void set​(java.lang.String st)
      Method to set the actual SubTurn. It sets it to be the SubTurn represented by the given String, or null if there is no such represented SubTurn
      Parameters:
      st - (string representing the SubTurn to be set)

    • set

      public static void set​(java.lang.String st, java.lang.String player)
      Method to set the actual SubTurn and player. It sets it to be the SubTurn represented by the given String, or null if there is no such represented SubTurn. It also set the current player to be the one given. This method calculates if it's the player's turn Or if it's an opponent one and set it properly.
      Parameters:
      st - (the String representation of the SubTurn).
      player - (the name of the actual Player).

    • setSubTurn

      public static void setSubTurn​(ViewSubTurn subTurn, java.lang.String player)
      Method to set the actual SubTurn and player. It properly sets it to be the SubTurn given or the opponent's correspecctive. It also set the current player to be the one given
      Parameters:
      subTurn - (the ViewSubTurn to be set).
      player - (the name of the actual Player).
